entities.description: Past 12 months when the respondent was most depressed, anxious, or emotionally stressed.
Frequency of feeling nervous during the worst month in the past 12 months.
Frequency of feeling hopeless during the worst month in the past 12 months.
Frequency of feeling restless or fidgety during the worst month in the past 12 months.

relationships.description: Links the survey to the time period of the past 12 months when the respondent was most stressed.
Indicates the frequency with which the respondent felt nervous during the specified survey period.
Indicates the frequency with which the respondent felt hopeless during the specified survey period.
Indicates the frequency with which the respondent felt restless or fidgety during the specified survey period.
